trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The ConvertEventArgs is used to format and unformat values displayed by a Windows Forms control that is bound to data through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: O ConvertEventArgs é usada para formatar e unformat valores exibidos por um controle de formulários do Windows que está associado aos dados por meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event occurs whenever a control property is bound to a value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event occurs whenever the bound value changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>evento ocorre sempre que uma propriedade do controle está associada a um valor e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>evento ocorre sempre que altera o valor associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>eventos permitem que você criar formatos personalizados para exibir dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data in a table is of type <xref:System.Decimal>, you can specify that the data should be displayed in the local currency format--by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the ConvertEventArgs to the formatted value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os dados em uma tabela são do tipo <xref:System.Decimal>, você pode especificar que os dados devem ser exibidos no formato de moeda local – definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>ConvertEventArgs para o valor formatado na propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: Você deve unformat Consequentemente o valor exibido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the value of the current property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém o valor da propriedade atual.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do valor.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the desired value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de dados do valor desejado.

trans-unit.source: The DesiredType property enables you to check the type of the property that the value is being converted to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DesiredType permite que você verifique se o tipo da propriedade que o valor está sendo convertido em.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the desired value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do valor desejado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value contained by the Value property depends on the event in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned.
trans-unit.target: O valor contido pela propriedade de valor depende do evento no qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>será retornado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> can be returned in either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>pode ser retornado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>evento ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, the Value property contains the unformatted property value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>é retornado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>evento, a propriedade de valor contém o valor da propriedade não formatado da fonte de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, you can read the property value, format the value, and reset the Value property to the new (formatted) value, thereby setting the value displayed in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>eventos, você pode ler o valor da propriedade, o valor de formato e redefinir a propriedade de valor para o novo valor (formatado), portanto, definir o valor exibida no controle associado a dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs> is returned in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, the property contains the custom-formatted value of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>é retornado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>evento, a propriedade contém o valor de formatação personalizada do controle associado a dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, you must read the formatted value, parse it, and convert it back to the same data type as the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>eventos, você deve ler o valor formatado, analisá-lo e convertê-lo de volta para o mesmo tipo de dados como a fonte de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse>

trans-unit.source: You can then reset the Value property to the unformatted value, and thereby set the value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Você pode redefinir a propriedade de valor para o valor não formatado e, portanto, defina o valor da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of the data source, examine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo da fonte de dados, examine o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs"> </xref>.
